ComicInfo.Title: The Last Beauty and the Beast Story; The Peaceable Kingdom. Chapter Seven of Happily Ever After.
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rose Red, still at her magical old home in the woods, learns why she and Snow are so special - and why they have become lodestones for the accumulation of great powers. And much to her surprise, she finds that she is truly happy here for the first time since she can remember.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 08:21:34. [CVDB473621]
